CustomField.description: Style of the table used for line items. Standard (default) = user-defined fields as columns with line items listed vertically.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Style of the table used for line items. Standard (default) = user-defined fields as columns with line items listed vertically.
CustomField.label: Table Style
